import React, { useState, useRef, useEffect } from 'react' import DeviceProcess from '../../api/deviceProcess' import table from '../../assets/img/table.png' import './index.scss' export default function Chart8 () { // const [isScrolle, setIsScrolle] = useState(true) // 滚动速度，值越小，滚动越快 const speed = 50 const warper = useRef() const childDom1 = useRef() const childDom2 = useRef() // 开始滚动 useEffect(() => { // 多拷贝一层，让它无缝滚动 childDom2.current.innerHTML = childDom1.current.innerHTML let timer if (isScrolle) { timer = setInterval( () => warper.current.scrollTop >= childDom1.current.scrollHeight ? (warper.current.scrollTop = 0) : warper.current.scrollTop++, speed ) } return () => { clearTimeout(timer) } }, [isScrolle]) const hoverHandler = flag => setIsScrolle(flag) function formatter (val) { return parseFloat(val).toFixed(2) } const [data, setData] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { DeviceProcess.GetResultUnitLoadList( '39fa16ee-03c2-2359-3725-6fcd0e873cfb', '39fa16ee-b3a0-d6a9-36c3-f1fd76ee02b7', '39fa2c14-7fcc-f4f4-84a4-aa546337e6d7' ).then(v => { setData(v.data) }) }, []) return (
